thread.title: Lorraine Armstrong

author: Lorraine Armstrong
title: Lorraine Armstrong
text:
Trusted Housesitters is a safe, secure and efficient company that provides and fulfills a community need of marrying homeowners and house and petsitters all over the world. It allows homeowners to go away on holidays or business having the comfort of knowing their home and pets are being loved and safely well looked after in their absence. Conversely, it allows house and pet sitters to experience time in a different part of the world amongst the local communities rather than staying in a sterile hotel accommodation. There are many homeowners registering their homes on the website which I turn gives a sitter a wide choice of homes , places and pets to apply for.
I highly recommend this company/website is you want the contentment and worry free holiday knowing your homes and pets are safe in your absence.
